name: Voyager (itch) (setff)
description:
Voyager is a game where you are in the middle of nowhere in space, you have to get from one planet to the other, but there are asteroids in your way, you have to get to the turret and shoot those asteroids to make the path clear, make sure to not hit the asteroids or you will go out of control, then you can go on your way!

Left mouse click to interact with Engine Buttons and Teleport Button.
Left mouse click to interact with the Turret Joy Stick.

Right mouse click to Exit the Turret.
Press F1 to restart.

This game is a proof of concept, we had and repair and energy system in mind, but due to the limited-time nature of Game Jam, we only implemented the core mechanics, the spaceship movement and physics.

Credits: Hang, Jo921ker, Gibito, Setff.
